channel.title: Counterpart Cash Association (CCA)
channel.description: Recent content on Counterpart Cash Association (CCA)

item.description: {{ partial "head.html" . }} counterparty.cash (XCPC) Home Features About XCPC Support Team Community Join Counterparty protocol ported for Bitcoin (Cash) Counterparty extends Bitcoin in powerful ways for peer-to-peer finance. Subscribe Joining the Association The Counterparty Cash Association (CCA) exists to support it's members communicate collaboaratively and free from persecution to progress the adoption of commercial instruments and distributed securities, tokens, licesnses, rights, units, works, derivatives and notorisation and access credientials in the Bitcoin Cash blockchain.
